café.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small restaurant where you can buy drinks and simple meals
café.translation[0].note_box[0].heading: – Meaning 1 : a small restaurant where you can buy drinks and simple meals
café.translation[0].note_box[0].sections: The central square was full of outdoor cafés.
We had a lunch at a pavement café in Montmartre.
They stopped at a motorway café.
Many transport cafés serve great breakfasts.
She was a waitress at a roadside café.
His father ran a café in Lerwick.
